longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents issued to
  nationals of Switzerland must be valid on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of
  Switzerland. 

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 30 days for holders
of a National ID Card, issued to nationals of Switzerland. 
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days: 
 - for holders of passports issued by Switzerland; 
Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Switzerland will be expected
  to hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
- Children up to and including 14 years of age
  
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay and documents required for their next
  destination.
- Holders of tourist visas must also hold hotel vouchers. 
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward ticket could be refused
  entry
